note.p: Death: Ithaca, New York, USA (02 November 1966)
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1970 vol 16 pp 175-232, plate, by Mansel Davies
References: B Bleaney and O V Lounasmaa, 'Nuclear orientation and nuclear cooling experiments in Oxford and Helsinki. Part 1. Progress before 1940' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 317 - 322
D Blow and S Wallwork, 'Prehistory of the British Crystallographic Association' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 177-186
